title: 6 Tips to Choose the Right Title & Subtitle for Your Self Published Book on Amazon KDP
description:
Choosing the right title and subtitle for your self-published book on Amazon KDP is an important step in the publishing process. The title and subtitle are often the first things that potential readers will see, and they can make a huge impact on whether or not a reader decides to click on your book and read more about it.

A catchy and descriptive title and subtitle can help to draw in readers and make your book stand out in a crowded market. On the other hand, a poorly chosen title and subtitle can make your book blend in with the competition and be overlooked by potential readers. It is important to put some real thought and effort into choosing these elements for your book to help it reach its intended audience and achieve success.

Here are 6 tips for choosing the right title and subtitle for your book.
